attributes.action: allow only the use of United Kingdom based proxy servers and each connection on them is logged back to the original Internet Protocol (IP)
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Over many years, we recieve lot's of spam, scams and other malicious emails.

People use proxies to send them and this makes them hard to trace.

Hackers and coders may also use these proxies for malicious intent.

Join the petition to allow only the use of United Kingdom based proxy servers and each connection on them is logged back to the original Internet Protocol (IP) , so that these offenders are easier to trace and shutdown.
